consequences.narrative: Your sword strikes true! The dragon roars in fury and counters with a massive fire blast. The ground trembles as the battle begins.
The dragon's fire spreads to nearby trees, creating a perimeter of flames that blocks escape routes.
The dragon remembers your betrayal and will hunt you relentlessly across the realm.
The goblin king is impressed by your courage! He offers you a golden goblet filled with mysterious liquid.
A new trade route opens between the goblin caves and human village. Both prosper from the exchange.
Some goblins challenge your leadership, creating internal conflict in the tribe.

b6c7d8e9f0a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e.originalInput: cast a spell to make it rain

consequences.narrative: Dark clouds gather above the drought-stricken lands. Thunder rumbles as the first drops of rain fall.
Farmers celebrate as crops begin to grow. Local markets boom with fresh produce.
Magical rain affects local creatures strangely. Some animals grow larger, others develop new abilities.
You find an ancient artifact pulsing with magical energy. Runes glow faintly on its surface.
Strange symbols on the walls seem to shift and change when you're not looking directly at them.
Something stirs in the depths below. The ground begins to shake slightly.

d8e9f0a1b2c3d4e5f6a7b8c9d0e1f2a.originalInput: tell a story in the tavern

consequences.narrative: The tavern crowd falls silent, captivated by your tale. The tavern keeper offers you a free drink.
News of your storytelling spreads through the village. People start seeking you out for entertainment.
A mysterious stranger in the corner nods knowingly, as if your story connects to a larger truth.
The hammer strikes true! Sparks fly as the magical metal takes shape in the forge.
The sword glows with an inner light. Ancient runes appear along its blade as magic flows through it.
A prophecy unfolds - this sword is destined to change the fate of the realm.
